metadata.title: The A-Z of Zika drug discovery

abstract.original_text: Teaser Zika clinical outcomes might be nefarious impacting newborns for a lifetime. There is still no drug available to cure Zika. We provide guidance to help understand and advance the search for a cure.

sentences.segment_text: Teaser Zika clinical outcomes might be nefarious impacting newborns for a lifetime .
There is still no drug available to cure Zika .
We provide guidance to help understand and advance the search for a cure .
